text: Babak Hatami (; born August 15, 1986) is an Iranian footballer who plays as a defender for Pars Jonoubi of the Persian Gulf Pro League. ==Club career== He started his career with Shahrdari Tabiz. In the summer of 2013 he joined Saipa. ===Persepolis=== He joined Iranian giants, Persepolis late in December 2014 after agreement signing between Persepolis and Saipa with a fee around 2 billion R (about US$70,000).
